hymn.title: Jesus, there's no one like You

layout.singingstanza: Je -- sus, Je -- sus, Je -- sus, There's no one like You. Je -- sus, Je -- sus, Je -- sus, I just love You. I love You, Je -- sus, pre -- cious Lord, No one's like You. I love You, Je -- sus, Won -- der -- ful, No one's like You. No one is like You, dear -- est One. You are the most pre -- cious Per -- son. Je -- sus, the most de -- sir -- ed One!

lyrics.stanza: Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, There's no one like You. Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, I just love You.
I love You, Jesus, precious Lord, No one's like You. I love You, Jesus, Wonderful, No one's like You.
No one is like You, dearest One. You are the most precious Person. Jesus, the most desired One!
Bridegroom, Bridegroom, Bridegroom, Your bride is calling You. Bridegroom, Bridegroom, Bridegroom, Your bride just wants You!
Most pleasant Person, dear Bridegroom, Come quickly soon! Most pleasant Person, dear Bridegroom, Come quickly soon!
You are the most pleasant Person. Your bride is waiting, dear Bridegroom. Bridegroom, we're calling, please come soon!
Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, the most beautiful! Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, the most wonderful!
One look at You, Oh glorious One, My heart You've won. Your touch, dear Lord is wonderful! You're wonderful!
Jesus, the fairest of the fair! No one, dear Lord can e'er compare. Jesus, the fairest of the fair!
